name: Test Plan with Pace Placeholders
description: A test training plan that demonstrates pace placeholders like @easy@, @mp@, @tempo@, @interval@

workouts.title: Easy Run @easy@
workouts.description:
Easy Run @easy@
Run at a comfortable, conversational pace

workouts.title: Tempo Run @tempo@
workouts.description:
Tempo Run @tempo@
Warm up 1 mile, then 2 miles at tempo pace @tempo@, cool down 1 mile

workouts.title: Interval Training @interval@
workouts.description:
Interval Training @interval@
Warm up 1 mile, then 4 Ã— 800m at @interval@ with 400m recovery, cool down 1 mile

workouts.title: Easy Run @easy@
workouts.description:
Easy Run @easy@
Recovery run at easy pace

workouts.title: Long Run @mp@
workouts.description:
Long Run @mp@
Start easy @easy@ for 2 miles, then 3 miles at marathon pace @mp@, finish easy @easy@

workouts.title: Easy Run @easy@
workouts.description:
Easy Run @easy@
Comfortable pace with focus on form

workouts.title: Fartlek @easy@ to @interval@
workouts.description:
Fartlek @easy@ to @interval@
Warm up 1 mile @easy@, then 20 minutes alternating between @easy@ and @interval@, cool down 1 mile @easy@

workouts.title: Threshold Run @tempo@
workouts.description:
Threshold Run @tempo@
Warm up 1.5 miles @easy@, then 3 miles at @tempo@, cool down 1.5 miles @easy@

workouts.title: Recovery Run @easy@
workouts.description:
Recovery Run @easy@
Very easy pace for active recovery

workouts.title: Long Run with Progression
workouts.description:
Long Run with Progression
Start 3 miles @easy@, then 2 miles @mp@, then 2 miles @tempo@, finish 1 mile @easy@
